name: Emotion Facility
description:
move you're mouse around to look around the arrows on the side is how to move from room to room. The red buttons on the other rooms activate the lazars (not both just the one it that room) activate the lazars when you see something in the hallway. when you hear a high pitch warp sound that's Smiley and a lower pitched one is Frowny along with that one that sound reversed is right and the one that isn't is the left.

@korbeo he made the game

Nextbots because they gave me the idea

FNAF because of the style of the game

@korbeo for the art because it took a while :(

@korbeo on youtube because I know you aren't subscribed
